correct: An exact location in space with no size or dimension.

correct: A straight path that continues forever in both directions.

question: Which of these best describes a 'line segment'?
correct: A part of a line with two distinct endpoints.
options: A line that goes on forever.
A part of a line with two distinct endpoints.

question: What is the main difference between a line and a line segment?
correct: A line is infinite, while a line segment has a fixed length.
options: A line is straight, while a line segment is curved.
A line has one endpoint, while a line segment has two.
A line is infinite, while a line segment has a fixed length.

correct: It serves as the universal reference line for all other longitudes and time zones.
options: It is the longest line on Earth.
It marks the hottest part of the planet.
It separates the Northern and Southern Hemispheres.
It serves as the universal reference line for all other longitudes and time zones.
